login-card-title: Organizing your finances has never been easier.
login-card-text: It doesn't matter if you split bills with someone. We will help you keep everything organized. Enter now, it's free!
login-card-policies: By using {{appName}}, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

section-header.title: Control your family or individual finances
section-header.subtitle: Knowing how much you and your family spend doesn't have to be complex. Come and discover the new era of financial organization and reach your goals.

section-benefits.groups-description: Create groups to enter common expenses for your family or a group of friends.
section-benefits.cards-description: Keep track of your invoices and don't get caught out.
section-benefits.bank-accounts-description: Track your balance and don't stay in the red.
section-benefits.reports-description: Check out monthly reviews of your financial life.

no-groups: Unfortunately, you are not part of any groups yet. Ask someone for an invite or create a new group.
settings-save-successful: The settings have been successfully saved.
delete-account-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
